system.description: One of the children of Poseidon, your lower half is fish-like and you have gills. Both can be magically hidden as you masquerade as a human. Lower all DRs by 4 when underwater. You die if you go 1+toughness days without submerging in fresh seawater (minimum 1 day). Roll d6 to gain an additional class
system.flavorText: One of the children of Poseidon, your lower half is fish-like and you have gills. Both can be magically hidden as you masquerade as a human.
